remarks: Lemma used to derive properties of norm.  Part of Theorem 3.3(ii) of [Beran] p. 97.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
normlem7t.1 $e |- A e. ~H $.
normlem7t.2 $e |- B e. ~H $.
normlem7tALT $p |- ( ( S e. CC /\ ( abs ` S ) = 1 ) -> ( ( ( * ` S ) x. ( A .ih B ) ) + ( S x. ( B .ih A ) ) ) <_ ( 2 x. ( ( sqrt ` ( B .ih B ) ) x. ( sqrt ` ( A .ih A ) ) ) ) ) $.
